title: NEED 20 RP can anyone give me 20rp
body:
i need only 20rp can anyone give me plz and ill give more because my master card is stolen
ill make a new one after 2months but i need this rp 
THANKS.
****

replies.body:
I'm with *Crimson Marquis* on this one, reaching out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is definitely the way to go.

Let me know if you have any questions.
You could always try to write a heartwarming letter to Riot support if you are missing 1 or 2 rp, though if we are talking 20 rp it might be a little too much.
It's not too much. I made them a poem asking for 1 RP and they gave me 42 RP instead! :D
